profiles.label: Brand Management
profiles.description: Brand strategy, portfolio management, launch excellence, and HCP/patient marketing
profiles.tagline: Brand Management Leader driving commercial strategy and launch excellence across oncology therapeutics
profiles.headline: Brand Management Leader | Oncology Strategy, Launch Excellence, Portfolio Management
competencies: Leads integrated oncology brand strategy across HCP and patient audiences, grounded in clinical insights and commercial goals
Drives portfolio management and launch excellence through data-driven planning and cross-functional collaboration
Translates market analytics and competitive intelligence into actionable brand positioning and go-to-market strategies
Builds omnichannel engagement frameworks that align messaging, channels, and customer experience

profiles.label: Strategic Planning & Positioning
profiles.description: Commercial strategy, messaging & positioning, go-to-market planning, and market analysis
profiles.tagline: Strategic Planning Leader driving commercial strategy, messaging, and positioning in pharmaceutical marketing
profiles.headline: Strategic Planning & Positioning Leader | Commercial Strategy, Messaging, Go-to-Market Planning
competencies: Pioneers AI/ML integration in pharmaceutical marketing, from custom GPT development to enterprise-wide education and adoption
Drives digital transformation initiatives that modernize workflows, enhance capabilities, and deliver measurable efficiency gains
Architects data engineering solutions (Python, DuckDB, ETL pipelines) that enable advanced analytics and decision-making
Leads innovation programs fostering continuous learning, experimentation, and client-facing value creation

profiles.label: Customer Experience (CX) & Omnichannel Innovation
profiles.description: Omnichannel strategy, experience design, AI/ML implementation, and innovative engagement
profiles.tagline: CX & Omnichannel Innovation Leader designing intelligent customer experiences through AI/ML and innovative engagement strategies
profiles.headline: CX & Omnichannel Innovation Leader | Experience Design, AI/ML Implementation, Innovative Engagement
competencies: Designs end-to-end omnichannel journeys connecting channels, messages, and data into cohesive customer experiences
Builds journey maps and conversion flows making behavioral drop-offs and optimization opportunities explicit
Partners with analytics and media teams to align targeting, sequencing, and KPIs with experience goals
Implements CRM and marketing automation logic supporting segmentation, personalization, and measurement

filtering_rules.notes: Bullets are scored by counting how many priority_tags they match. Higher scores = more relevant. If a role has no tag matches, show the first N bullets as fallback.
